```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(ggplot2)
library(grillade)
```


Loading grillade HTML dependencies :

```{r}
htmltools::attachDependencies(
  htmltools::tags$div(),
  html_dependency_grillade()
)
```
